install_msg:
ðŸ”´ __**SimpleCheckers**__
Play Checkers against your friends or the bot, or make bots play together. Configure payouts and let users bet against each other. The only variant available right now is English Draughts (also known as American Checkers). Note that capturing pieces is mandatory in the rules of this game. Games persist after a bot restart.
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load simplecheckers
2. Make sure ImageMagick is installed on the bot's host machine: https://imagemagick.org/script/download.php
3. Optionally, enable the slash command with [p]slash enable checkers
  3.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  3.2. Then restart Discord.
4. Start playing with [p]checkers or [p]draughts or /checkers
5. Example to play against a friend with a bet of 100 credits: [p]checkers @friend 100
6. View commands witrh [p]help SimpleCheckers```
short: Play Checkers against your friends or the bot, with economy support.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store user data.
